channel.title: Major FPS drop in Assassin Room.
channel.description: I notice major FPS drop in the Main Big Room before you get knocked out where the assassin's fight you after i load a quick save or normal save in that room and in the elevator before you talk to the guard. When i exit that room the FPS goes back to where i can play the game smooth again. Just thought to let the Dev's know about this. ^_^

item.title: Major FPS drop in Assassin Room.
item.dc:creator: LtSlipknot
item.description:
I notice major FPS drop in the Main Big Room before you get knocked out where the assassin’s fight you after i load a quick save or normal save in that room and in the elevator before you talk to the guard. When i exit that room the FPS goes back to where i can play the game smooth again. Just thought to let the Dev’s know about this.
